notes.text: sap.m.DatePicker: Now DatePicker does not override the style of the Dialog
sap.m.Dialog: Scrollbar detection improved for IE
sap.m.MessageStrip: Formatted text has an inline positioning
sap.m.MultiInput: Cloning is now corrected
sap.m.MultiInput: Delete list mode is always used
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is shown correctly in ObjectPage
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Calculating height in percents corrected
sap.m.SelectDialog: Click delegate changed to tap
sap.m.Link: Support of changing the target in adaptation mode
sap.m.TabContainer: Added new background design property
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Draggable and resizable properties added. Tests added.
SAP-icons: Add "soccer" as alias for "soccor" (typo)
UploadCollection: Terminating an upload removes an item from the collection
sap.m.Button: Closing button pressed loop on popup opened
sap.m.Button: text and icon are visible when the control is inside active list
sap.m.Carousel: Changing pages with keys fast is now possible
sap.m.ComboBox: Closing after interaction race condition fixed
sap.m.DateRangeSelection: documentation is updated
sap.m.DateTimeField: binding used in UTC mode specified in source works correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: doesn't show button if the list is empty
sap.m.IconTabBar: Padding classes are now forwarded to the header
sap.m.Input: Placeholder is now fully visible in rtl
sap.m.Input: Value is now preserved when value help is requested
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Value State Error is reset correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: Demokit sample adjusted
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Active title with level different than 1 is displayed correctly
sap.m.ObjectStatus: pseudo invisible text for ARIA doesn't take space
sap.m.Popover: Popover does not close on navigation
sap.m.Popover: aria-labelledby improvement
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: minor fix in a sample
sap.m.Token: Toggle selection on space key adjusted
sap.m.Tree: No action is needed for dummy leaf expander
sap.m.demokit.tutorial.walkthrough: add missing file to config
SAP Icons v4.5 update
StandardListItem: visual adaptation
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fires viewChange event
P13nConditionPanel: improve date validation
TreeItemBase: selection handling on model reset enhanced
sap.m.Carousel: visiblePagesCount now stops loop in all directions
sap.m.MenuButton: Disabled button is no longer highlighted on press
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Sync selectedKeys & selectedItems
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Accessibility improved
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Order in controls' collection is fixed
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Expand functionality select removed for mobile devices
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Sorting sample corrected
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: formats picker text properly in foreign languages
sap.m.Switch: Fiori 3 VD changes
sap.m.TabStripItem: Close button has tooltip now
sap.m.ActionSheet: Scrollbar is now visible on tablet
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: separatorStyle key-value pair names are now matching
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: No exception when content is undefined
sap.m.TileContainer: focus index is correct now
sap.m.Toolbar: Corrected vertical alignment
sap.m.Wizard: Detach event listeners from the step when removed

sap.m.FlexBox: Styles are now changed correctly

sap.m.MultiInput: Prevent exception when pressing arrows

sap.m.GenericTile : Default Aria-label contains 'GenericTile' info which is not required.
